body_html: I'm not sure stream executor works for OS X yet (hence #664). I did test cudnn v5 on my local machine and it seemed to work, so I'm not entirely sure why it's still failing for you -- might double check that the symlinks and cudnn header file and ./configure options have been set properly.

body: I'm not sure stream executor works for OS X yet (hence #664).  I did test cudnn v5 on my local machine and it seemed to work, so I'm not entirely sure why it's still failing for you -- might double check that the symlinks and cudnn header file and ./configure options have been set properly.
